post.description: This endpoint can be used to create sub-accounts.
post.x-sdk-method-description: This endpoint can be used to create sub-accounts.

password.description: Password(7-24 characters, must contain letters and numbers, cannot only contain numbers or include special characters)

subName.description: Sub-account name(must contain 7-32 characters, at least one number and one letter. Cannot contain any spaces.)

access.description: Permission (types include Spot, Futures, Margin permissions, which can be used alone or in combination).

post.description: This endpoint can be used to add sub-accounts Margin permission. Before using this endpoints, you need to ensure that the master account apikey has Margin permissions and the Margin function has been activated.
post.x-sdk-method-description: This endpoint can be used to add sub-accounts Margin permission. Before using this endpoints, you need to ensure that the master account apikey has Margin permissions and the Margin function has been activated.

post.description: This endpoint can be used to add sub-accounts Futures permission. Before using this endpoints, you need to ensure that the master account apikey has Futures permissions and the Futures function has been activated.
post.x-sdk-method-description: This endpoint can be used to add sub-accounts Futures permission. Before using this endpoints, you need to ensure that the master account apikey has Futures permissions and the Futures function has been activated.

get.description: This endpoint can be used to get a paginated list of sub-accounts. Pagination is required.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of results per request. Minimum is 1, maximum is 100, default is 10.

pageSize.description: Number of results per request. Minimum is 1, maximum is 100

openedTradeTypes.description: Subaccount active permissions,If do not have the corresponding permissions, need to log in to the sub-account and go to the corresponding web page to activate

get.x-sdk-method-description: This endpoint can be used to get a paginated list of sub-accounts. Pagination is required.

get.description: This endpoint returns the account info of a sub-user specified by the subUserId.

parameters.name: includeBaseAmount
parameters.description: false: do not display the currency which asset is 0, true: display all currency

subUserId.description: The user ID of a sub-user.

available.description: Funds available to withdraw or trade.

holds.description: Funds on hold (not available for use).

available.description: Funds available to withdraw or trade.

holds.description: Funds on hold (not available for use).

available.description: Funds available to withdraw or trade.

holds.description: Funds on hold (not available for use).

tradeHFAccounts.description: This param is deprecated and only valid for some old users

get.x-sdk-method-description: This endpoint returns the account info of a sub-user specified by the subUserId.

get.description: This endpoint can be used to get paginated Spot sub-account information. Pagination is required.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of results per request. Minimum is 10, maximum is 100, default is 10.

subUserId.description: The user ID of the sub-user.

available.description: Funds available to withdraw or trade.

holds.description: Funds on hold (not available for use).

available.description: Funds available to withdraw or trade.

holds.description: Funds on hold (not available for use).

holds.description: Funds on hold (not available for use).

get.x-sdk-method-description: This endpoint can be used to get paginated Spot sub-account information. Pagination is required.

get.description: This endpoint can be used to get Futures sub-account information.

frozenFundsTotal.description: Total frozen funds for withdrawal and out-transfer

accountName.description: Account name, main account is main

get.x-sdk-method-description: This endpoint can be used to get Futures sub-account information.

post.description: This endpoint can be used to create APIs for sub-accounts.
post.x-sdk-method-description: This endpoint can be used to create APIs for sub-accounts.

passphrase.description: Password(Must contain 7-32 characters. Cannot contain any spaces.)

permission.description: [Permissions](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/doc-338144)(Only GeneralSpotFuturesMarginInnerTransfer(Flex Transfer) permissions can be set, such as "General, Trade". The default is "General")

ipWhitelist.description: IP whitelist(You may add up to 20 IPs. Use a halfwidth comma to each IP)

subName.description: Sub-account name, create sub account name of API Key.

get.description: This endpoint can be used to obtain a list of APIs pertaining to a sub-account.(Not contain ND Broker Sub Account)

isMaster.description: Whether it is the master account.

get.x-sdk-method-description: This endpoint can be used to obtain a list of APIs pertaining to a sub-account.(Not contain ND Broker Sub Account)

delete.description: This endpoint can be used to delete sub-account APIs.
delete.x-sdk-method-description: This endpoint can be used to delete sub-account APIs.

post.description: This endpoint can be used to modify sub-account APIs.
post.x-sdk-method-description: This endpoint can be used to modify sub-account APIs.

passphrase.description: Password(Must contain 7-32 characters. Cannot contain any spaces.)

permission.description: [Permissions](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/doc-338144)(Only GeneralSpotFuturesMarginInnerTransfer(Flex Transfer) permissions can be set, such as "General, Trade". The default is "General")

ipWhitelist.description: IP whitelist(You may add up to 20 IPs. Use a halfwidth comma to each IP)

subName.description: Sub-account name, create sub account name of API Key.

get.description: You can get the user info of all sub-account via this interface It is recommended to use the GET /api/v2/sub/user interface for paging query
